_sText:
**INFO** This is a fairly large map, spesifically designed for Zombie HUNTING, but should work just as well for regular Zombie Mod. **BULK CONSTRUCTION** It is mainly comprised of corridors and hallways. I've tried to keep the amount of campable safe-havens to a minimum, but there are still defendable positions, though they are few and far between. There are several sizable rooms in the map, so expect sh*t to go down here. The map is riddled with crates and obstacles, and there are plenty of places to hide, adding to the suspense and atmosphere. There are 4 floors, 3 different spawns including both T's and CT's, 2 elevators and plenty of staircases. The map is built to be flexible and adaptable to most situations since the map is very interconnected. The map features both well lit areas as well as areas where the flashlight is mandatory for proper navigation. The map is balanced to the best of my ability. It contains few/none secrets, in order not to make the game unbalanced for either humans or zombies. I hope you and your zombie friends will have much fun with this. [Here](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y5H0cGnnhRw "Here") is a video I made, showcasing the map briefly. Enjoy! ====== ### This map is dedicated to the Elite-Hunterz Zombie servers. Thanks for your awesomeness. **CHANGELOG**
================= v1.0a (15 JAN)
- Initial release
v1.1a (16 JAN)
- Fixed some textures not displaying correctly
- Fixed some props
- Fixed problem with cubemap build
- Tweaked elevator logic
- Karate-chopped filesize
**NOTE:** _This version does NOT include cubemaps due to performance and filesize, but I will post another version that does shorty._ **NOTE:** _This version does NOT include HDR lighting due to performance and filesize, but I will be posting a version that does shortly._ **NOTE:** _This version does NOT include soundscapes, but version 1.0b will._ **NOTE:** _All the dependant files and necessary textures are included in the BSP._ All feedback is appreciated, so please, tell me what you think!
